data.name: Format data received from an API
data.description:
The recipe API returns the following array of ingredients. These ingredients are imperial and sometimes inconsistent. Convert the units into metric system and abbreviate the units as follows.

```
Tablespoons / Tablespoon ----> tbsp
Teaspoons / Teaspoon --------> tsp
Cups / cups -----------------> cup
ounces / ounce --------------> grams
pounds / pound --------------> grams
```

```
use convertion formul'e 
1 ounce = 28.3495 grams 
1 pound = 453.592 grams 
```
round down the numbers to the nearest integer (28.3495 grams = 28 grams).

remove paranthesis '()', text between paranthesis & commas ','.

eg:
```
input = ["3/4 cups Fresh Basil Leaves", "1/2 cup Grated Parmesan Cheese", "12 ounces, weight Pasta (cavitappi, Fusili, Etc.)" ]

output = ["3/4 cup Fresh Basil Leaves", "1/2 cup Grated Parmesan Cheese", "340 grams weight Pasta"]
```
